Interface MessageDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDAO<Message>, DeletableDAO<Message>, InsertableDAO<Message>, UpdatableDAO<Message>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageDAOImpl

    public interface MessageDAO
extends BaseDAO<Message>, InsertableDAO<Message>, UpdatableDAO<Message>, DeletableDAO<Message>
    DAO interface for messages
    Author:
    luis
